home.quote: There is no disease in a healthy body. Your body is wise and tells you what it needs.
home.floating_desc: Your body is wise. Without dependencies, awakening your inner healer.
home.prog_edu_desc: Lectures on Urohealth, life philosophy and self-management.
home.prog_eco_desc: Farm visits, lodging, and nature contact.
home.prog_home_desc: Therapies and diagnosis in the comfort of your home in Bogota.
home.pillar_1_desc: Urine therapy moves, shakes, and strengthens the immune system.
home.pillar_2_desc: Bioenergetic exercises to reactivate your mitochondria.
home.pillar_3_desc: Break dependency and manage your own health.
home.cta_title: Start your path to a full life

about.bio_p1: Born in Manchuria (1944), Dr. Atom is a living bridge between ancient Eastern wisdom and Latin American vitality. A graduate of Oriental Medicine in Tokyo, he dedicated his life to finding the root of real health, far from pharmaceutical dependency.
about.bio_p2: In 1990, he founded the historic Natural Hospital in Nicaragua with Dr. Uriu, healing thousands through self-management. His philosophy is radical and liberating: 'There is no disease in a body with clean blood and an aligned spine.'
about.interview_desc: Get to know Dr. Atom philosophy on life and death first-hand.
about.alicia_desc: The compassionate heart of Biohealth. Dr. Alicia combines the technical precision of homeopathy with inexhaustible human warmth. A specialist in chronic pain management and patients with reduced mobility, she has perfected the use of Biomagnetism (magnets) and heat therapy. She is an expert in the 'Gyaooo' technique, an immediate structural adjustment method, and leads home visits in Bogota, bringing hope where traditional medicine has given up.
about.bio_p3: Today, from his sanctuary in Anolaima, he practices what he preaches: cultivating his own organic food, teaching detachment, and the serene acceptance of death as part of a full life. He is the world authority on Urohealth.

program.target_desc: This program is designed for people looking to regain control of their health, disconnect from urban stress, or require specialized assistance for pain.
program.questions_title: Not sure which program is for you?
program.edu_intro: Education is the foundation of true health. Understand Urohealth and life philosophy.
program.edu_content: Based on 8 World Congresses. We teach Urohealth as the queen of natural therapies to reactivate the parasympathetic nervous system. We also cover acceptance of natural death and the joy of living.
program.eco_intro: Biosalud Farm is a home. A Natural Hospital where air and earth are the doctors.
program.eco_content: Total immersion to detoxify body and spirit. Live in an organic farming environment, participate in ecological walks to reactivate mitochondria, and share living food from our garden.
program.home_intro: We bring oriental and bioenergetic therapy to your home when pain prevents movement.
program.home_content: For patients with reduced mobility. Comprehensive diagnosis (O-Ring Test), Biomagnetism to balance pH, Acupuncture, and the Gyaooo method for quick bone and muscle adjustments.
